label: RawVectorQuery
description: Vector search with a provided raw vector array.

fields.label: Fields
fields.tooltip: Vector fields (Collection(Edm.Single)) to include in the vector search.

fields.label: K
fields.tooltip: Number of nearest neighbors to return as top hits.

fields.label: Vector
fields.tooltip: Raw vector array (number[]). Use Edit JSON to paste an array of floats.

fields.label: Weight
fields.tooltip: Relative weight of this vector query compared to other vector/text queries.

fields.label: Exhaustive
fields.tooltip: When true, triggers an exhaustive k-nearest neighbor search across all vectors within the vector index.

fields.label: Rerank With Original Vectors
fields.tooltip: If true, enables reranking using original vectors (required for oversampling in some cases).
